name: ANNUAL_PLAN_UPSELL_CONFIRMATION
value:
Congrats on switching to the DashPass annual plan, {user_first_name}.

We've charged your {card_type} ending in {card_last4} a total of {annual_fee} for the annual plan. A refund of the {monthly_fee} you paid this month for the monthly plan has been refunded to your card. Your refund should be processed within 7 days.

name: ANNUAL_PLAN_UPSELL_CONFIRMATION_CARDLESS

value: Switch to Annual Plan and get DashPass for {annual_plan_charge_monthly}/mo ({annual_plan_charge} billed yearly). Plus get a {promo_amount} off promo for one order a month, for your first year. That comes out to just {annual_plan_charge_monthly_with_promo} per month after savings.

name: ANNUAL_PLAN_UPSELL_INTRO_OFFER_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION_TREATMENT_D
value: Switch to Annual Plan ({annual_plan_charge} billed yearly) and save {annual_plan_saving_amount} on membership fees. Plus get a {promo_amount} off promo for one order a month, for your first year. That’s {annual_plan_saving_amount_with_promo} in total savings.
